name: Ars De Yaxche In Xibalba Regnum.

screenshots.caption: Just To Turn Black The SplitPane Divisions And The Spectrum To Gray And Light Gray.

short_description:
The basic idea for a fully featured multimedia center. 
Ironically simplified by complex structure and databases.
Almost all functions are in the GUI... the rest are in menus.
it is not finished, because i need someone to help me to join some code and modify some open source codes i used for some features.
I have not tested everything on all operative systems... and the sliders are not working anymore, i do not know why (that makes playback impossible because they are supposed to work together). The art work panel is not showing pictures.
In theory, It counts with:

CD Rip, CD/DVD/Blue Ray Burner, Audio analysis tool, duplicates finder by byte-byte or audio analysis, audio and video recorders, web cam, tagger (musicbrainz and last.fm), devices recognition and synchronisation (including iPod), audio effect, equalizer, file organiser, web browser, composition tools, converter /decoder, etc.
Please do not test all functions, or do it at your own risk.
If you want to join, tell me
